sen.j: 東山区（ひがしやまく）は、京都市を構成する11区のうちのひとつ。
sen.e: Higashiyama Ward is one of the eleven wards in Kyoto City.
Higashiyama Ward is one of the eleven wards in Kyoto City.
Higashiyama Ward is one of the eleven wards that constitute Kyoto City.

sen.j: 区内には祇園や京阪三条駅周辺などの繁華街がある。
sen.e: The ward includes the downtown areas such as Gion and the area around the Keihan Sanjo Station.
The ward includes downtown areas such as Gion and the area around the Keihan Sanjo Station.
The ward includes downtown areas such as Gion and the area around the Keihan Sanjo Station.

sen.j: 京都のなかでもとりわけ歴史的建造物などの多い場所であるため再開発事業などに対しての規制が比較的厳しく、住環境の整備がなかなか行わない為、『都会の過疎地』となっている（現在、市内11区中で人口が最も少ない。
sen.e: Because Higashiyama Ward in Kyoto, in particular, has a wealth of historic buildings, regulations on redevelopment projects in the area has been relatively strict and the living environment has not been improved sufficiently; as a result, the ward has become a "sparsely-populated urban area" (the ward has the smallest population in the eleven wards in Kyoto City).

Since Higashiyama Ward in Kyoto has a wealth of historic buildings, regulations on redevelopment projects in the area has been relatively strict, causing insufficient improvement of the living environment; as a result, the ward has become a "sparsely-populated urban area" (the ward has the smallest population in the eleven wards in Kyoto City).

Since Higashiyama Ward in Kyoto has a wealth of historic buildings, regulations on redevelopment projects in the area has been relatively strict, causing insufficient improvement of the living environment; as a result, the ward has become a "sparsely-populated urban area" (the ward has the smallest population in the eleven wards in Kyoto City).

sen.j: また、全国の政令指定都市の行政区の中で、全住民に占める65歳以上の高齢者の比率がもっとも高い）。
sen.e: Additionally, among the administrative districts of the ordinance-designated cities in the country, Higashiyama Ward has the highest ratio of those aged 65 and over in the general population.
Additionally, among the administrative districts of the ordinance-designated cities in the country, Higashiyama Ward has the highest ratio of those aged 65 and over in the general population.
Additionally, among the administrative districts of the ordinance-designated cities in the country, Higashiyama Ward has the highest ratio of those aged sixty-five and over in the general population.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: 1929年 上京区から分離して成立
sen.e: 1929: Separated from Kamigyo Ward, Higashiyama ward was established.
1929: Separated from Kamigyo Ward, Higashiyama ward was established.
1929: Separated from Kamigyo Ward, Higashiyama Ward was established.
1931: Yamashina-cho was merged into the ward.
1931: Yamashina-cho was merged into the ward.
1931: Yamashina-cho was merged into the ward.

sen.j: 1976年 山科地区が山科区として分離
sen.e: 1976: Separated from Higashiyama Ward, the Yamashina area became Yamashina Ward.
1976: Separated from Higashiyama Ward, the Yamashina area became Yamashina Ward.
1976: Separated from Higashiyama Ward, the Yamashina area became Yamashina Ward.
